name: Burn Master
description:
Welcome to Burn Master

Goal: You are overseeing a prescribed burning. Fires will spawn outside of the designated path. Keep fires at bay for 2 minutes!!

Use your fire extinguisher to put them out and keep the fire from spreading on the grass!

Use ARROW keys to move.
SPACEBAR to spray water at the fire (must be standing to the left of the fire). 
Move to the other side of the map by walking off the screen.

-- Note: This game is a prototype and is not fully fleshed out. Some bugs that occur are: 

  • 2-minute timer does not appear in corner of the screen but will begin once game starts. 
  • Player will teleport over to the right side of the screen if they walk off the left side, but if they try and come back, the fire extinguisher will not follow
